comment.author: 34529921@N07
comment._content: The Great Eastern was an iron sailing steam ship designed by Isambard Kingdom Brunel. She was the largest ship ever built at the time of her 1858 launch, and had the capacity to carry 4,000 passengers around the world without refueling. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SS_Great_Eastern.

comment.author: 89809226@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Nautical Art, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
